response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is truly a game-changer in its field. It offers unparalleled value and benefits that align perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe it is worth every penny of its $1,000,000 value to you. Considering this significant investment, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire the product at a special price of $950,000. This represents a substantial saving for you while ensuring you receive the best possible deal. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
